name: Slice it! 2 -Cut line puzzle
description:
"It’s time you put your brain to work with our new puzzle game! Slice it! 2

– Puzzle Game will test your precision and your problem-solving skills in the best way possible.
All you need to do is cut the shape in half perfectly in a single swipe.
Sounds easy? Think again. We have dozens of challenging levels that will make even the most competitive players think twice before making the cut!

*** “slice it! 2– Puzzle Game” is completely free to play!
